meaning_str.bing:
n. 精兵；【军】现役兵额
adj. 产生预期结果的；有效的；实际的；事实上的
网络. 生效的；有效果的；效率

产生预期结果的；有效的；实际的；事实上的

有效的；起作用的；实际的；事实上的；有影响的；实用的；执行中的；生效中的；实施中的；起法律效力的
[军]现役兵额；实际可作战的军人；精兵；有效力量；有生力量；现役人员

1.en: Which of the purification procedures used for this enzyme is most effective (i. E. , Gives the greatest relative increase in purity)?
1.cn: 此酶纯化过程中哪步最有效？（即纯度相对增加最大的步骤）。

2.en: She said music was more effective than silence, conversation or talk radio in achieving an optimal state of alertness.
2.cn: 她认为在保持最佳警觉方面，音乐比沉默、交谈、无线电通话更有效。

3.en: With such a low percentage of use, it would not be cost effective to spend time attempting to further improve this path.
3.cn: 由于它的使用频率特别低，因此不值得花费时间进一步改进此路径。

0.en: It's not an effective way? What other way would you...
0.cn: 不是有效的方式？那你们还有什么其他方式...

1.en: This was the most effective way I discovered for making great decisions.
1.cn: 这是我发现的做出好决策的最有效的方法。

2.en: Taking a long walk. Good, down. And then there's the one that's proved most effective: sex.
2.cn: 长时间散步。很好，没问题。根据证实最有效的方法就是做爱。

3.en: It's more effective to use our capabilities to help partners on the ground secure their own country's futures.
3.cn: 利用我们的军事优势帮助我们的盟友在地面保护他们自己国家的安全是更有效的方式。

5.en: Your humanity is cost-effective. So is your suffering.
5.cn: 你们的人性很节省成本，你的受难也一样。

6.en: The Golden Eagle, one of the world's most effective birds of prey.
6.cn: 金雕是世界上最有力的猛禽之一。

7.en: And it just so happens that when you take effective amounts of MDMA.
7.cn: 所以当我们吃摇头丸到一定的量这些细胞就会被启动。

8.en: Where did you get those? Billing is not an effective way to determine work.
8.cn: 你们从哪儿拿来的？账单并不是决定工作时长的有效方式。

9.en: All right. All right. Who can tell me the properties of an effective roar? Yes?
9.cn: 好了，谁能告诉我有效吼叫的特性？请说。

10.en: So you know it's bad? No, I know it's an effective piece of propaganda. That's all.
10.cn: 所以你觉得很糟？不，我知道这样宣传效果会很好，仅此而已。

11.en: You've been an outstanding deputy, Jackie. Far more effective than your more seasoned colleagues.
11.cn: 你一直是一位出色的副手 Jackie，比你那些老练的同事们还高效。

12.en: In related news, doctors say the Night Howlers' antidote is proving effective in rehabilitating the afflicted predators.
12.cn: 另外，医生宣称午夜嚎叫的解药已让受害食肉动物逐渐恢复。

13.en: This guy could be not just the best pitcher in our bullpen, but one of the most effective relief pitchers in all baseball.
13.cn: 他不仅会成为我们队里最佳的候援投手，在整个棒球界也会大放异彩。

14.en: Having said that, air drying your hands can be effective if done thoroughly, and truthfully, you don't always have an option.
14.cn: 话说回来，别无选择时，用烘手机还是可以有效地清除手上细菌。

15.en: Actually, they're things you can do. Just some home remedies, but in my experience I've found that some of them are quite effective.
15.cn: 事实上你可以用这些方法在家做治疗，根据我的经验，我发现有些方法很有效。

16.en: It was obviously effective. Leonard grew up to be an experimental physicist. Perhaps if she'd also denied him Christmas, he'd be a little better at it. Thank you.
16.cn: 显然易见，这是正确的，莱纳德长大后，现在是一位实验物理学家，也许如果她还不让他过圣诞节，他还会更出色些。谢谢。
